#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cmath>
#include <math.h>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	float h,m,h1,m1;
	cin>>t;	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>h;cin>>m;	
		std::stringstream ss;
		if(h>=24 || m>=60)
		cout<<"Invalid Time"<<endl;
		else
		{
				h=h+m/60;
				if(h>=12)
				h=h-12;
				m1=m*6;
				h1=h*30;
				if(h1>m1)
				h1=h1-m1;
				else
				h1=m1-h1;
				if(h1>180)
				h1=360-h1;
		                ss << std::fixed << std::setprecision( 1 ) << h1;

				std::cout << ss.str() << std::endl;
	}
	}
return 0;
}
